subtitle.Text: Steve: The lifecycle of the condom!
Karla: That's... that's not a real thing, Steve. Steve: The lifecycle of the condom... Karla: Alright, it's - Steve: ...by Karla Zimonja...

...is as follows. Initially the condom was a separate plot point - it was an actual plot point - we gave it to Lonnie and we had Sam find it in Lonnie's purse and it made Sam worried about what the hell she was doing with it, etc,
and that was sort of a wedge to drive them apart when that was the storyline, which it no longer is, because we decided we hated it,
but I had already made the condom asset, which I'm actually really proud of, I really like the condom! It's really good!
Also, I think Nero is a really good brand for a condom... Anyway!
Steve: Yeah it's a play on Trojan and everything... Karla: Yeah obviously. Steve: But it works...
Karla: But itâ€™s the whole like, notably decadent, you know, it's per - anyway, I like it. I'm proud of this thing.
Steve: And the specular on it looks really nice.
Karla: It does look good! So we had this extra asset lying around and we were like, we were all, "Oh it's a shame that it's going to waste, but you know, whatever, sometimes things don't get used,"

and then we remembered the horror of digging around in your parents' drawers and finding their condoms and stuff and being just utterly fucking horrified and we decided to give that to you, the player.
